title: Avid Pro Tools v10 3 5 HD Incl Patch v2 WiN x32 x64-TEAMVR
description:
------------------------------------------------------------
Avid.Pro.Tools.v10.3.5.HD.Incl.Patch.v2.WiN.x32.x64-TEAMVR
------------------------------------------------------------

Description :

Studio-standard professional audio recording and music creation softwareÃ¢â‚¬â€includes everything you need to make music. Includes a powerful bundle of virtual instrumentsÃ¢â‚¬â€including synths, drums, pianos, sampled instruments, and more. Comes with 8 GB of loopsÃ¢â‚¬â€create instant backing tracks. Features tons of effects and plug-insÃ¢â‚¬â€shape your sound with guitar amp tones, EQ, sound processing, and more. Avid Channel Strip plug-in offers the EQ and compression found in the acclaimed Euphonix System 5Ã¢â‚¬â€one of the most sought-after recording consoles ever
Features advanced editing tools for crafting and perfecting your musicÃ¢â‚¬â€get the same tools the pros use.
Enjoy session compatibility with Pro Tools users and studios around the worldÃ¢â‚¬â€exchange sessions and files hassle-free. Use Pro Tools with a dedicated audio interface or your laptop sound cardÃ¢â‚¬â€ultimate flexibility and portability.

THIS IS THE WINDOWS VERSION ONLY (x86 + x64) Tested on Windows 8 Profession x64
Follow Instructions Exactly.

Instructions:

CAUTION FIRSTLY YOU HAVE TO UNINSTALL ALL YOUR AVID STUFF FROM PROTOOLS.
[IF ANY SETUP ASKS FOR SYSTEM RESTART, ACCEPT IT]

UNINSTALL ANY PREVIOUS PROTOOLS:

To do so, close Protools, go to Start, Control Panel, Uninstall a program.
Choose ProTools and in the setup uninstall SPECIFYING THAT YOU WANT TO UNINSTALL THIS :
AVID DRIVER, SETTINGS, EVERYTHING.

Then Download CCleaner

And go to the tab "Tools" and then "Uninstall", Select every Pace antipiracy stuff that you see and uninstall it.
Go to the "Registry" tab, scan for issues, click on "fix selected issues" AND REPEAT this step 5-6 times if needed.

If you don't see any avid stuff that could harm Protools setup you can [REBOOT]

Then go to Program Files [on 32-bit systems] or Program Files (x86) [on x64]

And delete avid folder.

Then it's finally clean

INSTALLATION [Windows 7]

1. Extract and Install Protools

2. Restart after avid driver's installation.
  Install PT 10 (Native) keeping the default options and restart.

3. Then Install BETA PATCH 7 (TEAM V.R)

4. Run KillerBugs v2 according to your version of Windows (32 or 64 bits)

For [Windows 8] - Go to the installation folder of Pro Tools
(Pro Tools Installer/ISSetupPrerequisites),

Search and install:
Avid Core Runtime files, Avid HD Driver x64 and x64 DigiDriver.

[Note]: These files are hidden, you need to enable Windows Explorer to view hidden files.

5. Enjoy!


Thanks to TEAM V.R and GAZ 51.
ABOD. MMXIII // FRANCE

[PS]: Caution ! Before running the software copy : "iZotope_Radius_Win32.dll"
- From "C:/Program Files (x86)/Common Files/Digidesign/DAE/Plug-Ins"
- To "C:/Program Files (x86)/Avid/Pro Tools"

(On 32-bit systems the Program Files folder is named without "(x86)" at the end)

If you do not do that, when you will run the software for the first time you will have a "izotope_radius.dll not found"
and will not be able to use the "elastic audio" feature of ProTools.

[NOTE]: Includes Patch Beta 9 which may contain bugs! Use at YOUR OWN RISK!! YOU HAVE BEEN WARNED!!!
